title: Is there any way to export downloaded music in Spotify? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you have subscribed for Spotify premium, you can get the rights to download Spotify music for offline listening. Although these offline playlists are essentially cached streams, you can export these offline files to your drive. 1 Open Spotify desktop client. Click the top-right corner of besides your user name and select Settings. 2 Scroll down and click SHOW ADVANCED SETTINGS, and find the Offline Songs Storage to see where your cache is stored.  3 Go to that folder on your computer, select all the files in that folder. And then you can save these files to your drive. And then you can import these files to your Spotify for playback.
